features: Proven in a Clinical Trial: NovaFerrum has been clinically proven to be Safe, Well Tolerated, and Effective at raising iron levels. (JAMA June 13, 2017 Volume 317, Number 22)
No Bad Stuff: NovaFerrum Does Not contain Gluten, Sugar, Alcohol, Parabens, Synthetic Colors, or Caffeine.
Natural Fruit Extracts: NovaFerum Does contain Natural fruit flavors and Natural fruit sweeteners.
Great Tasting: NovaFerrum has a pleasant taste that kids will enjoy, without the yucky taste of iron.
Dose: In One dose you get 15 mg of iron per One mL/dropper. One bottle contains 120 servings, a 4-month supply. It can be dispensed directly or you can mix it with formula or juice.
body.description: YUMMY - Liquid Iron Supplement For Infants and Toddlers NovaFerrum Raspberry Grape flavored liquid iron is going to be the new favorite among the kids. It has a wonderful flavor that kids enjoy with the beneficial iron supplements that they need to grow big and strong. We don’t compromise on flavor or the health benefits, using only ingredients that are good for your kids and none of the bad stuff. Our product is free of sugar, alcohol, dye, gluten. Unlike most liquid multivitamin with iron supplements that use iron salts, our patent-pending formula uses a Polysaccharide-Iron Complex. NovaFerrum has a “great tasting” raspberry-grape flavor and does not have the unpleasant metallic aftertaste you find in most other iron liquid multivitamin with iron supplements.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YUMMY - Liquid Iron Supplement For Infants and Toddlers NovaFerrum Raspberry Grape flavored liquid iron is going to be the new favorite among the kids. It has a wonderful flavor that kids enjoy with the beneficial iron supplements that they need to grow big and strong. We don’t compromise on flavor or the health benefits, using only ingredients that are good for your kids and none of the bad stuff. Our product is free of sugar, alcohol, dye, gluten. Unlike most liquid multivitamin with iron supplements that use iron salts, our patent-pending formula uses a Polysaccharide-Iron Complex. NovaFerrum has a “great tasting” raspberry-grape flavor and does not have the unpleasant metallic aftertaste you find in most other iron liquid multivitamin with iron supplements. Supplement Details Raspberry Grape Flavor 15 mg of Iron 120 Servings

Clinically Proven Unlike most other supplements, NovaFerrum has been clinically proven to be safe, well-tolerated, and effective at raising iron levels. (JAMA, June 13, 2017, Volume 317, Number 22) ONLY GOOD STUFF NovaFerrum contains premium ingredients designed for optimum quality and effectiveness. We add natural fruit flavors and natural fruit sweeteners. We won’t settle, and we know you won’t either, which is why we constantly seek the best nutritional ingredients available. NONE OF THE BAD STUFF NovaFerrum does NOT contain gluten, sugar, alcohol, parabens, synthetic colors, or caffeine. We scrutinize and agonize over every ingredient. We even consult licensed medical professionals so that you can feel good about what you’re taking, even before you take it.

OUR STORY BEGINS WITH A YUCK NovaFerrum was born of necessity. One day, our founder was attempting to give an iron supplement to his baby daughter. The product smelled bad. And, based on her reaction, it tasted even worse. She refused to take it. Thus began the journey for an iron supplement that was not only gentle and effective but tasted exceptionally good. NovaFerrum is a labor of love created for a family member. Only now, you’re family. We focus on natural, quality ingredients that are well tolerated and do the job in a big way. We remain passionate about providing products that don’t contain anything unnecessary, that can help keep you healthier, and that stand apart from other supplements. Welcome to the family. And thanks for sharing our passion.

Multivitamin with Iron Vegan Multivitamin with Iron Multivitamin Liquid Iron High Potency Liquid Iron Multivitamin with Elderberry & Iron For Infants & Toddlers Infants & Toddlers Infants & Toddlers Infants & Toddlers Adults Adults Flavor Raspberry Grape Raspberry Grape Orange Raspberry Grape Raspberry Grape Raspberry Grape Iron per Serving 10 mg 10 mg N/A 15 mg 125 mg 18 mg Number of Servings 50 50 50 120 36 32 Proven in Clinical Trial ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great iron supplement and our baby loves it
reviews.reviewText: We found out our little girl, 9 months old, needed an iron supplement. I was nervous about finding a well made product that also she would drink, since many people say their children didn’t like the taste of iron supplements and would spit it out. I purchased this product and bottle is beautiful, easy to read, and comes with perfect dispenser labeled with quantity. My daughter absolutely loves the taste and we love the high grade ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unlike other iron supplements, this one doesn’t taste like metal. My daughter likes this one. So easy to take and it doesn’t give my baby constipation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Child loves the Taste
reviews.reviewText: I have now ordered this at least 4 times. My child loves it and asks for iron sometimes before I even offer! I am glad he enjoys it because in the past when we used a different brand that tasted bad he would refuse to take it. With this brand he takes his daily iron and I’m a happy mom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: These drops smell like cough syrup, which I didn’t expect after reading all the reviews that mention the sweet smell/taste. My daughter needs 2ml of iron drops per day—I bought these after reading reviews because the enfamil drops made her gay and vomit immediately. She still makes a disgusted face for these drops, but she doesn’t gag and vomit so that’s progress. I tasted these drops myself and they are definitely better than enfamil which have no flavoring other than iron, but these do still have that lingering iron flavor as if you had a mouthful of coins. It’s just a little lighter and masked by the cough syrup flavor.
